formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: V_u = P_u - q_u \, A_0 \quad,\quad \phi V_c = \phi_v \, 4 \sqrt{f'_c}\, b_o\, d
formulas.raw: V_u = P_u - q_u \, A_0 \quad,\quad \phi V_c = \phi_v \, 4 \sqrt{f'_c}\, b_o\, d

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Required area (service): $$ A_{req} = \frac{P_{service}}{q_a} $$ Adopted plan dimensions for square footing: $$ B = L = \sqrt{A_{req}} $$ Factored soil pressure: $$ q_u = \frac{P_u}{B \cdot L} $$ Two-way (punching) shear around column: $$ b_o = 2\,(c_1 + c_2) + 4d \quad,\quad A_0 = (c_1 + d)(c_2 + d) $$ $$ V_u = P_u - q_u \, A_0 \quad,\quad \phi V_c = \phi_v \, 4 \sqrt{f'_c}\, b_o\, d $$ One-way shear (worst direction shown): $$ a_x = \frac{B - c_1}{2} \quad,\quad V_{u,x} = q_u \, L \, (a_x - d) $$ $$ \phi V_{c,x} = \phi_v \, 2 \sqrt{f'_c}\, L\, d $$ Flexure per unit width (cantilever strip, lever arm z â‰ˆ 0.9d): $$ M_{u,strip} = \frac{q_u\, a^2}{2} \quad,\quad A_s \approx \frac{M_u}{\phi_b \, f_y \, z} $$ Unit consistency is required throughout (US or SI).

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
